import React from 'react' import './checkout.styles.scss' import { connect } from 'react-redux' import { createStructuredSelector } from 'reselect' import CheckoutItem from '../../components/checkout-item/checkout-item.component' import { StripeCheckoutButton } from '../../components/stripe-button/stripe-button.component' import { selectCartItems, selectCartItemsTotalPrice, } from '../../redux/cart/cart.selectors' // use test creadit card for payments: 4242 4242 4242 4242 01/20 123 const CheckoutPage = ({ cartItems, total }) => (
Product
Description
Quantity
Price
Remove
{ cartItems.map(cartItem => ) }
TOTAL: ${total}
) const mapStateToProps = createStructuredSelector({ cartItems: selectCartItems, total: selectCartItemsTotalPrice }) export default connect(mapStateToProps)(CheckoutPage)
